evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS services for its cloud infrastructure.
Physicians Realty Trust employs Azure for secure data management and application hosting.
They are compliant with HIPAA regulations for data handling in healthcare environments.
References to FHIR standards in their operational documents, indicating they handle health data in compliance with modern standards.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of engaging in healthcare X12 transactions or EDI use cases.
